You can get your API key from Google AI Studio website.
This name will be displayed in the chat in your messages.
This name will be displayed in the chat in the model response.
This value will be used to split the text extracted from the file.
This is the size of the overlap between chunks.
Controls the randomness of the model\'s output. Higher values (e.g., 0.8) make output more creative but less focused, while lower values (e.g., 0.2) make output more deterministic and focused.
Limits the vocabulary used for model sampling to the top k most likely tokens. Higher values (e.g., 50) include more words, while lower values (e.g., 5) make the model more selective.
Limits the vocabulary dynamically based on the cumulative probability of tokens. A higher value (e.g., 0.9) includes more words, while a lower value (e.g., 0.5) makes the model more selective.
Sets the maximum number of tokens the model can generate in response to a prompt. Useful for limiting the length of generated text.
Adjusts safety features to control the appropriateness of generated content. Higher values prioritize safety, while lower values may allow more creative but potentially sensitive outputs.
Please upload files to start the chat.
